bio:treatment.description: Plants hoary white to silver-green. Stems shorter than 0.2 cm, gemmiform to short-julaceous. Leaves often broader than long, hyaline in distal 1/2–1/4; costal apiculus absent or very short, of 1 or 2 cells; distal laminal cells short-hexagonal, (1–)2–3:1, sometimes a few quadrate cells present.
